name: New World Colony
description:
New World Colony is a strategy board game where you settle territories, gather resources, upgrade buildings, construct defenses and invade your opponents.

Every turn gives you meaningful decisions about expanding and protecting your colony or anticipating and thwarting your enemy's plans.

It's easy to learn and you can practice against the AI and then join thousands of other players in online matches.

"One incredible package that is hard to put down." - iPadBoardGames.org

"Strategy fans rejoice, games like this are far & few between" - AppVader.com

"I can't stop playing it, and if you download it, neither will you. 10/10" GamingTillDisconnected.com

- Play locally or online against up to 4 players.
- Multiple buildings including sawmills, granaries, towns, forts, strongholds, trading posts, and shipyards.
- Play against 3 computer difficulties.
- Normal, Defensive, Pacifist, and Warlord game modes each with different and challenging rules.
- Map editor to create your own custom boards.
- Built-in tutorial to bring you up to speed quickly.
